strategy: This lane is pretty boring because she will just roam. Do not stand on or near her daggers, or she will look to trade with you. You heavily out-sustain her. Just ping her roams because they rely on this to get fed. She will probably dodge your Q3 and Ult with her E, so try to all-in her when she doesn't have it. When you look for a trade, go on her with either Q1 or Q2; she will easily dodge your Q3.
tips: Katarina's skills deal magic damage. Even if she buys items that increase her attack damage, increase your magic resistance to counter her.
Try to save a hindering effect for when Katarina uses Death Lotus.
